Package com.group8rhea.monopolyserver.repository

Interface GameRecordStoreRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<GameRecordScoreEntity,​java.util.UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<GameRecordScoreEntity,​java.util.UUID>
    @Repository
public interface GameRecordStoreRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<GameRecordScoreEntity,​java.util.UUID>
    This interface handles the queries on the joined table from game_record and game_score. It handles retrieval of the leaderboard.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long>> getLeaderboardAllTimes()  
      java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long>> getLeaderboardBetweenDates​(java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate)  

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

        count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteAllById, deleteById, existsById, findAll, findAllById, findById, save, saveAll

    • Method Detail

      • getLeaderboardAllTimes

        @Query(value="SELECT um.username, ids.score FROM ( SELECT gs.user_id id, SUM(gs.score) score FROM game_score gs, game_record gr WHERE gs.game_id = gr.game_id GROUP BY gs.user_id ) ids, user_model um WHERE um.id = ids.id;",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long>> getLeaderboardAllTimes()
        Returns:
        Returns the leaderboard considering all the games.

      • getLeaderboardBetweenDates

        @Query(value="SELECT um.username, ids.score FROM ( SELECT gs.user_id id, SUM(gs.score) score FROM game_score gs, game_record gr WHERE gs.game_id = gr.game_id and gr.created_at >= :startDate and gr.created_at <= :endDate GROUP BY gs.user_id ) ids, user_model um WHERE um.id = ids.id;",
       nativeQuery=true)
java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Long>> getLeaderboardBetweenDates​(@Param("startDate")
                                                                                                java.util.Date startDate,
                                                                                                @Param("endDate")
                                                                                                java.util.Date endDate)
        Parameters:
        startDate - Determines the start date of the game to be considered.
        endDate - Determines the end date of the game to be considered.
        Returns:
        Returns the leaderboard considering games whose dates are between startDate and endDate.
